metadata.description: Business validation rules for user registration and data compliance
metadata.author: RuleEngine Team

rules.description: User age must be 18 or older
rules.errorMessage: User must be at least 18 years old to register.

rules.description: Start date must be before end date
rules.errorMessage: Start date must be earlier than end date.

rules.description: Account balance must be positive or zero

rules.errorMessage: Username is required and cannot be null.
Recommended to use corporate email domain (company.com).
Transaction amount exceeds recommended maximum of $10,000.

rules.description: User must be active and verified
rules.errorMessage: User must be both active and verified to proceed.
Password should be at least 8 characters for better security.
